# Exams and Grading {-}

The course will contain three mid term exams and a final exam.

## Evaluation criteria {-}

Exams         Points           Percentage
----------    ------------     ------------
Mid-term 1    30 points        15%
Mid-term 2    50 points        25%
Mid-term 3    50 points        25%
Final exam    70 points        35%
TOTAL         200 points       100%


## Grading policy {-}

Percentage    Grade     GPA
------------  --------  ---------
90 or more    A         4
88 - 90       A-        3.667
85 - 87       B+        3.333
80 - 84       B         3
78 - 79       B-        2.667
75 - 77       C+        2.333
70 - 74       C         2
69.5 or less  F         0
